timeline.bodyText: Please change to static member import, now it is just a duplication of example above
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -61,6 +61,13 @@ * 
  * <module name="AvoidStaticImport"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * import static java.lang.Math.*;   // violation
+ * import static java.lang.System.*; // violation

replies.bodyText: @AmrDeveloper you changed both lines, but you need to change only one. Point here is to have 2 static import lines - one with star import and second is import of static member
replies.author: strkkk

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/AvoidStaticImportCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/AvoidStaticImportCheck.java index 8a43f4654..c2f8ebcd2 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/AvoidStaticImportCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/AvoidStaticImportCheck.java @@ -63,10 +63,10 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.CommonUtil; * *

Example:

* 
- * import static java.lang.Math.*;   // violation
- * import static java.lang.System.*; // violation
- * import java.io.File;              // OK
- * import java.util.Scanner;         // OK
+ * import static java.lang.Math.pow;          // violation
+ * import static java.lang.System.out;        // violation
+ * import java.io.*;                          // OK
+ * import java.util.*;                        // OK
  *
*

* To configure the check so that the {@code java.lang.System.out} member and all

timeline.bodyText:
Description says
 To configure the check so that the {@code java.lang.System.out} member and all
 * members from {@code java.lang.Math} are allowed

Please change this line to java.lang.System.out and one more line with violation
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:

+ * 
+ * import static java.lang.Math.*;   // OK
+ * import static java.lang.System.*; // violation
